string-array.name: guess_hints_desc_array
string-array.item: Shows you English title of this anime. You will able to type ONLY Japanese version. \nCost: %d
Shows you Japanese title of this anime. You will able to type ONLY OTHER LANGUAGE version. \nCost: %d
This option will show you all words, contains in this anime's English title in random order. \nCost: %d
This option will show you all words, contains in this anime's Japanese title in random order. \nCost: %d
Shows you a description of this anime. \nCost: %d
Shows you name of displayed characters. \nCost: %d

string-array.name: op_hints_desc_array
string-array.item: Shows you name of this song.\nCost: %d
Will be shown art from this anime/manga.\nCost: %d
Will be shown description of this anime/manga.\nCost: %d

resources.string: Do You really want to delete all the progress?
Lol, how did you done that?
Watch for updates, which will add more titles!
You now can access this hint for free for this anime.\n\n%s
ERROR: Title in this language does not exist
ERROR: Description in your language and in english does not exists
ERROR: Characters are not defined for this art
Incorrect language! You must write answer on another.
You must guess this title first!
~Characters is not defined or not present on art~
True, but You have already guessed it before..
